name: Flickering Flames in the Eastern Kingdoms
tooltip:
Flickering Flames in the Eastern Kingdoms

Visit the bonfires within Hillsbrad Foothills, Silverpine Forest, Westfall, and the Wetlands, then speak with the Festival Flamekeeper.

Requirements:
- Flame of Hillsbrad
- Flame of Silverpine
- Flame of Westfall
- Flame of the Wetlands
